answers.answer: Sounds wonderful for someone ..your e-mail is not put up here you can only send it in a private message on Med Help . .

question: Hi,I work for a production company in Brooklyn, and we're looking for a chef to host a new video cooking special aimed at educating people about healthy eating for Type 2 Diabetes. This is a paid opportunity. You should have a great personality, a healthy-cooking focus, and be able to cook meals for and answer questions from people with Type 2 diabetes on-camera. If you’re interested, please send your name, a photo, contact information, and brief descriptions of both yourself and your history in the culinary industry to:***@****If you are selected, you will receive a follow-up phone interview. If you are not selected, your name and the information you provide will not be retained or used for any other purposes. This video is for promotional and educational purposes only, and will not be distributed for sale.  Thanks for reading this!! Cheers.
title: Need Healthy Cooking Chef for Type II Diabetes
